trans-unit.source: Represents controls that provide, and are able to switch between, multiple representations of the same set of information or child controls.
trans-unit.target: Representa os controlos de fornecerem e conseguem alternar entre vários representações o mesmo conjunto de controlos de informações ou subordinado.

trans-unit.source: Examples of controls that can present multiple views include the list view (which can show its contents as thumbnails, tiles, icons, or details), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] charts (pie, line, bar, cell value with a formula), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_word](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-word-md.md)] documents (normal, Web layout, print layout, reading layout, outline), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_outlook](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-outlook-md.md)] calendar (year, month, week, day) and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wmp](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] skins.
trans-unit.target: Os exemplos de controlos que podem apresentar várias vistas incluem a vista de lista (que pode apresentar o respetivo conteúdo como miniaturas, mosaicos, ícones ou detalhes), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] gráficos (gráfico circular, linha, barra, valor de célula com uma fórmula), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_word](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-word-md.md)] documentos (normal, esquema Web, esquema de impressão, esquema de leitura, descrição), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_outlook](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-outlook-md.md)] calendário (ano, mês, semana, dia) e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wmp](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] das máscaras de.

trans-unit.source: The supported views are determined by the control developer and are specific to each control.
trans-unit.target: As vistas suportadas são determinadas pelo programador controlo e são específicas para cada controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o em cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de propriedade em cache devem ter sido anteriormente pedidos utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
trans-unit.target: Utilize <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.Current%2A>para obter o valor atual de uma propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e a sua utilização, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém o em cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controlo.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade pedida não está na cache.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: Este padrão tem de ser de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>com um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>referência para obter os valores atuais.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>foi obtido utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, contém apenas os dados em cache e tentar obter o valor atual de qualquer propriedade emite uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.Cached%2A>para obter o valor em cache de uma propriedade que foi anteriormente especificado utilizando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e a sua utilização, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controlo.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.CurrentView*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.CurrentView*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.CurrentView*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador é utilizado por aplicações de cliente de automatização de IU.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the name of a control-specific view.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome de uma visualização de controlo específicos.

trans-unit.source: View identifiers can be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.GetSupportedViews%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ver identificadores de podem ser obtidos utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.GetSupportedViews%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.GetSupportedViews%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control-specific collection of view identifiers is identical across instances.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de controlo específicos de identificadores de vista é idêntica em instâncias.

trans-unit.source: View names are suitable for use in Text to Speech, Braille, and other accessible applications.
trans-unit.target: Os nomes de vista são adequados para utilização no texto conversão em voz, Braille e outras aplicações acessíveis.

trans-unit.source: The control-specific view identifier.
trans-unit.target: O identificador específico do controlo de vista.

trans-unit.source: A localized string representing the control-specific view name.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia localizada que representa o nome da vista de controlo específicos.

trans-unit.source: viewId is not a member of the supported views collection.
trans-unit.target: viewIdNão é um membro da coleção de vistas suportadas.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern"> </xref> padrão de controlo.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador é utilizado por aplicações de cliente de automatização de IU.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de padrão é transmitido para métodos de como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>obter o padrão de controlo de interesse do <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> especificado</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Sets the current control-specific view.
trans-unit.target: Define a vista actual do controlo específico.

trans-unit.source: View identifiers can be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.GetSupportedViews%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ver identificadores de podem ser obtidos utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.GetSupportedViews%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation.GetSupportedViews%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control-specific collection of view identifiers is identical across instances.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de controlo específicos de identificadores de vista é idêntica em instâncias.

trans-unit.source: A control-specific view identifier.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador de vista específica do controlo.

trans-unit.source: viewId is not a member of the supported views collection.
trans-unit.target: viewIdNão é um membro da coleção de vistas suportadas.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the property that gets the control-specific collection of views.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade que obtém a coleção de controlo específicos de vistas.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador é utilizado por aplicações de cliente de automatização de IU.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Fornecedores de automatização de IU devem utilizar o campo equivalente na <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: This property is not present in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation> and must be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não está presente e <xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>tem de ser obtido utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.MultipleViewPattern.MultipleViewPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
